mapper.select: select count(a.drerror_devnum) from iot_realerror a,iot_deviceinfo b where a.drerror_devnum = b.di_serialnum and (b.di_deactive < 1 or b.di_deactive is null)

select count(DISTINCT a.drerror_devnum) from iot_realerror a,iot_devicerole b where a.drerror_devnum = b.devrole_devnum and b.devrole_roleid IN
#{item}

select a.*, b.di_name as DEVNAME,c.node_id as DEVORGID,c.node_name as DEVORGNAME,'错误' ALARM_TYPE from iot_realerror a,iot_deviceinfo b,iot_orgtreenode c where a.drerror_devnum = b.di_serialnum and b.di_nodeid = c.node_id order by a.drerror_receivetime desc

select a.*, b.di_name as DEVNAME,c.node_id as DEVORGID,c.node_name as DEVORGNAME,'错误' ALARM_TYPE from iot_hiserror a,iot_deviceinfo b,iot_orgtreenode c where a.dherror_devnum = b.di_serialnum and b.di_nodeid = c.node_id AND a.dherror_receivetime BETWEEN to_date(#{sStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{sEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') order by a.dherror_receivetime desc
